entry.value: LOCK TABLES mrl_sales_delivery_nifi WRITE, mrl_sales_delivery WRITE;
LOCK TABLES mrl_sales_payment_nifi WRITE, mrl_sales_payment WRITE;

SELECT DISTINCT -- ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY T1.entity_id ASC) entity_id, CAST(T1.entity_id AS INT64) order_id, T0.NumAtCard increment_id, CAST(T0.DocNum AS INT64) sap_id, T0.DocDate paid_date, T0.CardName payer, T0.U_paid_store paid_store, T0.U_paid_type paid_type, T0.U_paid_id paid_number, IFNULL(CAST(T0.U_voucher AS NUMERIC), 0) paid_voucher, IFNULL(CAST(T0.U_IN_BSAMN AS NUMERIC), 0) untaxed_amount, IFNULL(CAST(T0.U_IN_BSTAX AS NUMERIC), 0) tax_amount, IFNULL(CAST(T0.U_FreeAMN AS NUMERIC), 0) free_tax_amount, IFNULL(CAST(T0.CashSum AS NUMERIC), 0) paid_amount, CAST(T0.U_pay_installment AS INT64) pay_installment, T0.U_CompnyName mrl_name, T0.U_TaxIdNum mrl_tax_number, T0.U_IN_BSINV invoice_number, T0.U_GrpDscr invoice_item, T0.U_IN_BSDAT invoice_date, T0.U_IN_BSCNO invoice_random_code, T0.U_IN_BSNOT tax_id, T0.U_GUI_CarrierType carrier_type, T0.U_GUI_CarrierId1 carrier_number, T0.U_GUI_DonaCode dona_code, T0.U_GUI_PrintMK paper, 'paid' status, T0.DocDate created_at, T0.UpdateDate updated_at
FROM `czechrepublic-290206.mid_Prod.midORCT_ODPI` T0 INNER JOIN `czechrepublic-290206.m2v243.m2_order_enity_id_increment_id` T1 ON T0.NumAtCard = T1.increment_id where T0.Canceled = 'N'

SELECT DISTINCT entity_id, order_id, increment_id, sap_id, ship_date, receiver, receiver_phone, receiver_address, backup_phone, total_amount, status, created_at, updated_at FROM `czechrepublic-290206.mid_Prod.mrl_sales_delivery_draft_tmp_all` WHERE status IS NOT NULL ORDER BY entity_id
LOCK TABLES mrl_sales_delivery_draft_item WRITE, mrl_sales_delivery_draft_item_nifi WRITE;

SELECT entity_id parent_id, product_sku, product_name, product_price, product_qty, product_total FROM `czechrepublic-290206.mid_Prod.mrl_sales_delivery_draft_tmp_all` WHERE status IS NOT NULL ORDER BY parent_id
LOCK TABLES mrl_sales_delivery_draft_nifi WRITE, mrl_sales_delivery_draft WRITE;

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.value:
from org.apache.commons.io import IOUtils from java.nio.charset import StandardCharsets import re
# 獲取當前的 FlowFile flowFile = session.get()
if flowFile is not None: try: # 用 InputStream 讀取 FlowFile 內容 inputStream = session.read(flowFile) content = IOUtils.toString(inputStream, StandardCharsets.UTF_8) inputStream.close()
# 匹配所有的 JSON 對象的值 pattern = r'\{"BQ_mrl_sales_delivery_draft":"(.*?)"\}' matches = re.findall(pattern, content)
if matches: # 找到最新的值（按字典序比較） latest_value = sorted(matches)[-1]
# 將最新的值存為 FlowFile 屬性 flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, "BQ_mrl_sales_delivery_draft", latest_value)
# 將成功的 FlowFile 傳遞到 success relationship session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS) except Exception as e: # 將錯誤信息記錄為 FlowFile 屬性，並傳遞到失敗 relationship flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, "script.error.message", str(e)) session.transfer(flowFile, REL_FAILURE)

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY entity_id) AS auto_entity_id, entity_id AS parent_id, product_sku, product_name, product_price, product_qty, product_total, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AS processing_at FROM `#{BQ.projectID}.#{BQ.midDataset}.${BQ_mrl_sales_delivery_draft}` WHERE status IS NOT NULL ORDER BY parent_id
LOCK TABLES mrl_sales_delivery_draft_nifi WRITE, mrl_sales_delivery_draft WRITE;

config.comments: 在 BQ 將同張單據（同 DocEntry 者）標上相同的 entity_id， 並放在一張暫存的表當中

entry.value:
CREATE TABLE `#{BQ.projectID}.#{BQ.midDataset}.${BQ_mrl_sales_delivery_draft}` AS
WITH row_number_DocEntry AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DocEntry ASC) row_number, DocEntry FROM `#{BQ.projectID}.#{BQ.midDataset}.#{BQ.ODRF_DRF1}` GROUP BY DocEntry ) SELECT row_number_DocEntry.row_number entity_id, T1.entity_id order_id, T0.NumAtCard increment_id, T0.DocEntry sap_id, T0.DocDate ship_date, T0.U_mage2_receiver receiver, T0.U_mage2_rcvphone receiver_phone, T0.Address2 receiver_address, T0.U_dev_phone02 backup_phone, T0.DocTotal total_amount, CASE WHEN T0.CANCELED = 'Y' AND T0.DocStatus = 'C' THEN 'canceled' WHEN T0.CANCELED = 'N' AND T0.DocStatus = 'C' THEN 'complete' WHEN T0.CANCELED = 'N' AND T0.DocStatus = 'O' THEN 'open' END status, T0.DocDate created_at, T0.UpdateDate updated_at, T0.ItemCode product_sku, T0.Dscription product_name, CAST(T0.PriceAfVAT AS NUMERIC) product_price, CAST(T0.Quantity AS INT64) product_qty, CAST(T0.GTotal AS NUMERIC) product_total FROM `#{BQ.projectID}.#{BQ.midDataset}.#{BQ.ODRF_DRF1}` T0 LEFT JOIN row_number_DocEntry ON row_number_DocEntry.DocEntry = T0.DocEntry INNER JOIN `#{BQ.projectID}.#{BQ.m2Dataset}.#{BQ.m2. order_enity_id_increment_id}` T1 ON T0.NumAtCard = T1.increment_id WHERE T0.SupplCode LIKE 'DN%'
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `#{m2.mrl_sales_delivery}`) AS delivery_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `#{m2.mrl_sales_delivery_item}`) AS item_count
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT entity_id) AS delivery_count, COUNT(entity_id) AS item_count FROM `#{BQ.projectID}.#{BQ.midDataset}.${BQ_mrl_sales_delivery}` WHERE status IS NOT NULL;

entry.value:
from org.apache.commons.io import IOUtils from java.nio.charset import StandardCharsets import re
# 獲取當前的 FlowFile flowFile = session.get()
if flowFile is not None: try: # 用 InputStream 讀取 FlowFile 內容 inputStream = session.read(flowFile) content = IOUtils.toString(inputStream, StandardCharsets.UTF_8) inputStream.close()
# 匹配所有的 JSON 對象的值 pattern = r'\{"BQ_mrl_sales_delivery":"(.*?)"\}' matches = re.findall(pattern, content)
if matches: # 找到最新的值（按字典序比較） latest_value = sorted(matches)[-1]
# 將最新的值存為 FlowFile 屬性 flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, "BQ_mrl_sales_delivery", latest_value)
# 將成功的 FlowFile 傳遞到 success relationship session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS) except Exception as e: # 將錯誤信息記錄為 FlowFile 屬性，並傳遞到失敗 relationship flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, "script.error.message", str(e)) session.transfer(flowFile, REL_FAILURE)

entry.value: LOCK TABLES mrl_sales_delivery_item_nifi WRITE, mrl_sales_delivery_item WRITE;

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY entity_id) AS auto_entity_id, entity_id AS parent_id, product_sku, product_name, product_price, product_qty, product_total, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AS processing_at, order_item_id, group_parent_id, group_tag FROM `#{BQ.projectID}.#{BQ.midDataset}.${BQ_mrl_sales_delivery}` WHERE status IS NOT NULL ORDER BY parent_id
LOCK TABLES mrl_sales_delivery_nifi WRITE, mrl_sales_delivery WRITE;

SELECT DISTINCT entity_id, order_id, increment_id, sap_id, ship_date, receiver, receiver_phone, receiver_address, backup_phone, total_amount, status, created_at, updated_at, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AS processing_at FROM `#{BQ.projectID}.#{BQ.midDataset}.${BQ_mrl_sales_delivery}` WHERE status IS NOT NULL ORDER BY entity_id;
LOCK TABLES mrl_sales_delivery_nifi WRITE, mrl_sales_delivery WRITE;

config.comments: 在 BQ 將同張單據（同 DocEntry 者）標上相同的 entity_id， 並放在一張暫存的表當中
在 BQ 將同張單據（同 DocEntry 者）標上相同的 entity_id， 並放在一張暫存的表當中

entry.value:
CREATE TABLE `#{BQ.projectID}.#{BQ.midDataset}.${BQ_mrl_sales_delivery}` AS
WITH row_number_DocEntry AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DocEntry ASC) row_number, DocEntry FROM `#{BQ.projectID}.#{BQ.midDataset}.#{BQ.ODLN_DLN1}` GROUP BY DocEntry ) SELECT row_number_DocEntry.row_number entity_id, T1.entity_id order_id, T0.NumAtCard increment_id, T0.DocEntry sap_id, T0.DocDate ship_date, T0.U_mage2_receiver receiver, T0.U_mage2_rcvphone receiver_phone, T0.Address2 receiver_address, T0.U_dev_phone02 backup_phone, T0.DocTotal total_amount, CASE WHEN T0.CANCELED = 'Y' AND T0.DocStatus = 'C' THEN 'canceled' WHEN T0.CANCELED = 'N' AND T0.DocStatus = 'C' THEN 'complete' WHEN T0.CANCELED = 'N' AND T0.DocStatus = 'O' THEN 'open' END status, T0.DocDate created_at, T0.UpdateDate updated_at, T0.ItemCode product_sku, T0.Dscription product_name, CAST(T0.PriceAfVAT AS NUMERIC) product_price, CAST(T0.Quantity AS INT64) product_qty, CAST(T0.GTotal AS NUMERIC) product_total, T0.U_m2_ItemID order_item_id, T0.U_group_parent_id group_parent_id, T0.U_group_tag group_tag FROM `#{BQ.projectID}.#{BQ.midDataset}.#{BQ.ODLN_DLN1}` T0 LEFT JOIN row_number_DocEntry ON row_number_DocEntry.DocEntry = T0.DocEntry INNER JOIN `#{BQ.projectID}.#{BQ.m2Dataset}.#{BQ.m2. order_enity_id_increment_id}` T1 ON T0.NumAtCard = T1.increment_id

config.comments: 在 BQ 將同張單據（同 DocEntry 者）標上相同的 entity_id， 並放在一張暫存的表當中

entry.value: LOCK TABLES mrl_sales_delivery_item_nifi WRITE, mrl_sales_delivery_item WRITE;
LOCK TABLES mrl_sales_refund_nifi WRITE, mrl_sales_refund WRITE;

SELECT CAST(T1.entity_id AS INT64) order_id, T0.NumAtCard increment_id, CAST(T0.DocNum AS INT64) sap_id, T0.OVPM_DocDate refund_date, T0.CardName payee, T0.U_paid_store U_paid_store, T0.U_paid_type paid_type, T0.U_paid_id paid_number, CAST(T0.CashSum AS NUMERIC) paid_amount, T0.DocDate created_at, T0.UpdateDate updated_at, CASE WHEN T0.CANCELED = 'Y' AND T0.DocStatus = 'C' THEN 'canceled' WHEN T0.CANCELED = 'N' AND T0.DocStatus = 'C' THEN 'complete' WHEN T0.CANCELED = 'N' AND T0.DocStatus = 'O' THEN 'open' END AS status
FROM `czechrepublic-290206.mid_Prod.midOVPM_ORIN` T0 INNER JOIN `czechrepublic-290206.m2v243.m2_order_enity_id_increment_id` T1 ON T0.NumAtCard = T1.increment_id WHERE T0.CashSum IS NOT NULL AND( (T0.CANCELED = 'Y' AND T0.DocStatus = 'C') OR (T0.CANCELED = 'N' AND T0.DocStatus = 'C') OR (T0.CANCELED = 'N' AND T0.DocStatus = 'O'))
